ygData.subject: Re: The Rescue
ygData.msgSnippet: Tavatron turned her head in order to get a better view of what Dinobot was talking about. A small device was fastened to her armor, it appeared to be a claking

Tavatron turned her head in order to get a better view of what
Dinobot 
was talking about. A small device was fastened to her armor, it 
appeared to be a claking device of some kind. Well, that explained 
everything. Still, how did it get on her waist? She didn't remember 
fastening it, much less even seeing it before now. Had Dinobot put it 
there? If so, when? Then it dawned on her, she hadn't realized it 
before, most likely because she too busy being realived to see him. 
When she embraced him, he must have placed it on her waist. Which 
meant he had to touch her. That explained the feeling of hands at her 
waist, she just hadn't realized it at the time. He had even seemed a 
little reluctant to let go. Tavatron smiled up at him, so perhaps he 
wasn't completely emotionless after all. There may be hope for him 
yet. 

Tavatron was about to say something when suddenly several sirens in 
the room began to sound. She tensed for a moment before she heard 
Prowl's voice telling them to move it. She activated the device, the 
air before her shimmering slightly as Prowl and Iron Raptor came into 
focus beside what appeared to be the only exit. Tavatron turned to 
look at Dinobot, simultaneously drawing her sword. If they had to 
fight their way out of here she wasn't going to be caught off gaurd:

"Let's get out of here."

Tavatron jogged over to Prowl and Iron Raptor, catching the tail end 
of their conversation:

"Just do as she says, Prowl. We'll be right behind you."
